ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They had iman and so We gave them enjoyment for a time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And they came to believe; so We allowed them to enjoy the good things of life for an age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and they believed. So We let them enjoy life for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They believed in him so We granted them enjoyment for an appointed time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they accepted faith – We therefore gave them usage for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they believed; so We gave them enjoyment for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they believed, so We gave them provision till a time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and they believed; so We gave them enjoyment for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they believed, therefor We gave them comfort for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and they believed in him: so We let them live in ease for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they believed, whrefore We let them enjoy life for a season.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and they believed [in him]. So We provided for them for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And they believed; so We permitted them to enjoy (their life) for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they believed; so We gave them enjoyment for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and they believed, and We gave them enjoyment for awhile.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:148] And they believed, after they saw [with their own eyes] the chastisement which they had been promised. So We gave them comfort, We kept them alive to enjoy their wealth, for a while, until their terms [of life] would be concluded [while they took comfort] therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they believed) in him, (therefore We gave them comfort for a while) until the time of death without punishing them.
